sentences.en: A pharmacist can fill any prescription if, in his or her judgment, the prescription is valid.
sentences.cn: 只要药剂师认定处方有效就可按方配药。

sentences.en: Are you taking any other medicines whether on prescription or bought over the counter?
sentences.cn: 你在服用其他什么处方药或非处方药吗？

sentences.en: I want to have this prescription put up.
If you’re pregnant, you can get free prescriptions.
sentences.cn: 要是怀孕的话可以获得免费的处方药。

sentences.en: She made a mental note to have his prescription refilled.
sentences.cn: 她记着要拿他的处方再配一回药。

sentences.en: The chemist made a mistake when making up the prescription.
The dispenser quickly filled the prescription for me.
sentences.cn: 药剂师立刻照处方为我配了药.

sentences.en: The doctor felt her pulse and wrote a prescription.
sentences.cn: 医生为她诊脉,开了药方.

sentences.en: The doctor gave me a prescription for antibiotics.
The doctor wrote out a prescription.
The drug is available on prescription only.
sentences.cn: 这种药只能凭处方购买。

sentences.en: The new drug will not require a physician's prescription.
sentences.cn: 这种新药不需要医生的处方。

sentences.en: The physician made a prescription against sea - sickness for him.
sentences.cn: 医生给他开了个治晕船的药方.

sentences.en: These pills can be obtained by prescription only.
sentences.cn: 这些药丸只有凭医生处方才能买到.

sentences.en: We are trying to cut the price of prescription drugs .
sentences.cn: 我们正努力降低处方药的价格。

sentences.en: We had to wait for the pharmacist to make up her prescription.
sentences.cn: 我们只得等药剂师给她配好药。

sentences.en: You were helped a little by a fall - off in prescription drugs sales.
sentences.cn: 处方药品的销售额下降了,这对你也小有裨益.

sentences.en: You will have to take your prescription to a chemist.
sentences.cn: 你得拿着处方去找药剂师。

words.tran_cn: 规范主义；规约论；指示论

phrases.tran_cn: 须医师处方才可买的药品

trans.tran_cn: [医]药方，处方，处方药，训令，指示，法规
trans.tran_en: a piece of paper on which a doctor writes what medicine a sick person should have, so that they can get it from a  pharmacist
